Monitoring

Krill's module in which we will find the information related to the network's monitorization. It has the information of all the hosts and its services.

It's menu have the following elements:

  • Alarms
  • Problems
  • Matrix
  • Host groups
  • Sonar
  • Unprovisioned Onus
  • WorldMap
  • Smart Tree
  • CWMP Table
  • Host Events
  • History
